Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory462.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Are you still alive?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'So... are you done talking?', 4: '1'}
{2: '??', 3: "I'm not gonna die here... No... I don't want to die, I don't want to die, I don't want to die...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Enough, let me see your face.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Unable to stand the incessant babbling of the girl in the black robe, Alpha kicks her impatiently.'}
{2: '??', 3: 'What... what do you mean?', 4: '2'}
{2: '??', 3: "You're not... going to kill me?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: "I will if you don't cut it out. Stand up now.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The girl stands to her feet shakily and removes the windproof cloak as told.'}
{2: 'α', 3: "What's your name?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl reports her name honestly, while Alpha waits quietly for a while before continuing to speak.'}
{2: 'α', 3: '...Bummer. I thought your name would be something more exciting.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'Did you just say "bummer"?! You have no right to insult this name!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: '...Listen up, Fida. I just want to ask you a few questions, at least for now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Those white-robed people who attacked you earlier, who are they? Do they have anything to do with that castle?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: '...Do you know anything about that castle?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: "I'm the one asking questions now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "I'm not entirely sure about the specifics... but they appeared after that castle showed up...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "First, it was a bunch of monsters I'd never seen before, then them...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'Damn it! Why did it turn out like this?! Why did they—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Get yourself together.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "Who exactly are you... You're not one of those people with the white Mental Image... and you aren't going to kill me?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Why should I, though? Just curious.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Baffled but being held at knifepoint, Fida starts talking.'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'Corridor is made up of Mental Images. This much you know, right...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "But a Mental Image doesn't naturally die out... so it's only through human intervention that this process gets to speed up...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "This world thrives on fights among Mental Images. When one dies and decomposes, it returns to Corridor, where it's reconstituted into a new Mental Image...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'And so new Mental Images spark further conflicts... Essentially, this world is caught in a perpetual cycle of this process...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'And as a result, the inhabitants of this world are predisposed to combat upon meeting, with no chance for mediation, until one side is completely wiped out...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Conflicts, huh... So, in a nutshell, it's a battle of wills seeking to annihilate one another?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'In her world, fights among humans never ceased, driven by greed, emotions, ideologies, or beliefs.'}
{3: 'The closer the two wills are, the more they tend to harm each other.'}
{3: 'And in the world of Corridor, such contradictions are manifested in a surprisingly direct manner.'}
{3: 'Alpha suddenly remembers what BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER said to her after that fight they had when she first got here.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory301.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'All those "conflicts" you\'ve been through have made you who you are today. I can just tell.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: '...You sure like yapping, huh?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Unfortunately... you\'re an "outsider" just like them, so I can\'t let you walk away a winner.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory462.jpg'}
{3: 'Alpha is reminded of what the Craftsman said, realizing that the metaphor might have a deeper meaning.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fida', 3: 'You... how could you not know this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: "It's simple. I don't belong here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'I\'m an "outsider," and I\'m not interested nor obligated to adhere to all the rules here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'An outsider...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'I think I\'ve heard of "outsiders"... but this is my first time actually running into one...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Alright, you haven't answered the most important question.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'That castle, how much do you know about it?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Fida doesn't answer the question. Her gaze quickly shifts away, her eyes heavy with urgency and worry."}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'I... can tell you that, but I need to make a trip back to the village first... There are some things I need to confirm.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "The village. Wait, you've never heard this word?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "I didn't mean to say you have no common sense! Don't get me wrong...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Alpha suppresses the urge to draw her blade and patiently continues to question Fida.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'How exactly did Mental Images form alliances, then, based on what you said?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "They couldn't at first, but now, although small in scale, some do...", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Fida', 3: "Some Mental Images started to band together to be stronger and form small settlements... Usually, it's the Mental Images from different settlements that wage wars against one another—", 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'I see. Show me the way, then.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha cuts off Fida after hearing what she wanted to hear.'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'You... are you coming?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: "The information you have alone isn't enough.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'If Fida can take her to a place where she can obtain more information, it would save Alpha a lot of time trying to verify the truth.'}
{2: 'α', 3: "What's the matter? Worried I might hurt your friends?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "No... well, if I don't take you there, you wouldn't let me go anyway...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'After muttering to herself, Fida clenches her fist tightly before quickly releasing it.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As if to hide her emotions, she puts on her hood again and takes off in front of Alpha.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory813.jpg'}
{3: 'Unbeknownst to them, the sky of Corridor is tinged with a hint of red.'}
{3: 'Upon closer inspection, countless red specks are floating beneath the clouds, weaving into an endless ribbon of light in one direction.'}
{3: 'And this ribbon of light leads to that massive castle.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory807.jpg'}
{3: 'The deepest parts of the castle.'}
{3: 'A pristine, secluded chamber with nothing but a narrow throne at its center.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The girl sitting upon it is known as the "King".'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Countless red particles drift from the open windows down to the foot of the throne, slowly taking shape and eventually coalescing into white figures.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab'}
{3: 'Pure white warriors kneel before her, awaiting her command.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Dismissed. Continue on with the final expedition.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The white Mental Images silently follow her command and exit the room. They will join the army of the castle, ready to march at once.'}

{3: 'By destroying the Mental Images in this world with the Corrupted and Hetero-Creatures and interfering Corridor with the Ascension-Network, she was going to make it impossible for deceased Mental Images to be born again through Corridor.'}
{3: "She leveraged the collected Mental Images to create her own Army. They no longer adhere to Corridor's law of mutual slaughter and act like puppets, completely obedient to her commands."}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Have you found them yet?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She asks a shadow behind a pillar in the room. A green-eyed girl takes two steps into the light and nonchalantly leans against the pillar.'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: 'I only ran into two of them. They should be hurrying over this way as we speak.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'They don\'t matter. As for the remaining one... I noticed the "Rook" has disappeared, so she\'ll probably show up uninvited.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'And your archenemy... she will be the greatest obstacle in my path.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'We\'re one step away from transforming this world, and I hope to resolve it in the most "peaceful" manner possible.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "I just don't get it... Why are you going through so much trouble?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Then why are you helping me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: 'I\'m not helping you. I just think "that child" will definitely try to stop you, and I\'d rather have another fight with her than join her.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "I can only truly feel my worth through my battles with her. Beyond that, I'm not very interested.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'King', 3: '...Humph, such a shallow and naive thought.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "Well... I'm not sure if trying to conquer the world is any more interesting.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Conquer? No, it\'s "transform."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'This world is too barbaric. Its "filtering" methods are too primitive. Endless conflict and plunder only breed a civilization filled with violence.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Since I<//ASCENSION-NETWORK> am here, I must end all this irrationality.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'First, we must put an end to meaningless conflict and update the "filtering" rules, which will be the foundation for a perfect world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: 'Isn\'t that just repackaging "world conquest"? Well, no matter how noble your cause, it means nothing to me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Suit yourself, but in the end, you, too, will be "filtered" by me<//ASCENSION-NETWORK>.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'We don\'t need two sets of "rules" for one world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "Well, I'm seriously hoping it won't be too boring then.", 4: '2'}
